definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
(idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour
under the circumstances/the matter having come to that point
never put off until tomorrow what you can do today (idiom)
pinyin: jin1 ri4 shi4 jin1 ri4 bi4

definition: never put off until tomorrow what you can do today (idiom)
pinyin: jin1 ri4 shi4 jin1 ri4 bi4

definition: see 早知今日何必當初|早知今日何必当初[zao3 zhi1 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1]
pinyin: ji4 you3 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1

definition: if I (you, she, he...) had known it would come to this, I (you, she, he...) would not have acted thus (idiom)/to regret vainly one's past behavior
pinyin: zao3 zhi1 jin1 ri4 he2 bi4 dang1 chu1

sentences.english: J. Simpson's codefendants were in a Las Vegas court today.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森的共同被告今日走上拉斯維加斯法庭。

sentences.english: Send us a check today, do it now, so you will not forget.
sentences.chinese: 請於今日立即寄出支票，以免忘懷爲幸。

sentences.english: But what about other dinosaur relatives that are alive today?
sentences.chinese: 那麼今日仍倖存的恐龍親戚們是什麼情況呢？

sentences.english: Some ancient cities had two to three times as much water per person as many cities today.
sentences.chinese: 某些古代城市每人的用水量是今日許多城市的兩三倍。

sentences.english: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌基督，昨日今日一直到永遠是一樣的。

sentences.english: Today's chart of the day unites these two popular topics.
sentences.chinese: 今天的“今日圖表”將彙總這兩個時興話題。

sentences.english: I wasted today, was precisely yesterday perishes person of the body implored.
sentences.chinese: 我荒廢的今日，正是昨日殞身之人祈求的明日。

sentences.english: So Joshua burned Ai and made it a permanent heap of ruins, a desolate place to this day.
sentences.chinese: 約書亞將艾城焚燒，使城永爲高堆，荒場，直到今日。

sentences.english: Without you, today's emotions, would be the scurf of yesterday's.
sentences.chinese: 沒有你，今日的心情就只是昨日的頭皮屑。

sentences.english: Our sky chart shows the bright waxing gibbous moon and the planet Jupiter for around mid-evening tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今日的星圖展示了午夜前後明亮的凸月和木星。

sentences.english: Even now, raising cattle is still one of the  leading branches of economy.
sentences.chinese: 即使時至今日，畜牧業仍然是經濟的主要部門之一。

sentences.english: There is golf-ball-size hail in New Jersey today.
sentences.chinese: 新澤西州今日下起高爾夫球大小的冰雹。

sentences.english: Today, Beijing has already developed into a modern international metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 今日的北京，更已發展成爲一座現代化的國際大都市。

sentences.english: As requested by a disciple today's poem in calligraphy is attached.
sentences.chinese: 應一弟子的提請，今日的詩作寫成翰墨已附呈。

sentences.english: To date, but also as a rogue group singing the praises of the local community.
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，還要爲本土流氓集團歌功頌德。

sentences.english: Today we met at the bus stop early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 今日一大早，咱們相約在車站晤面。
